waterhole.commonlibs.net.apache.upload

Class HttpUploader

  • java.lang.Object
    • waterhole.commonlibs.net.apache.upload.HttpUploader

  • public final class HttpUploader
extends java.lang.Object
    Http 上传工具，利用java原生HttpURLConnection实现。
    See Also:
    uploadImage(HttpUploadListener, String, Bitmap, HttpProgressListener), uploadImage(HttpUploadListener, String, String, HttpProgressListener), uploadImage(String, Bitmap), uploadImage(String, Bitmap, HttpProgressListener), ...
